00038 $inst_dir = dirname(__FILE__). "/../../../";
00039 require_once('simpletest/unit_tester.php');
00040 require_once('simpletest/reporter.php');
00041 require_once('../../../include/packetfilter.inc.php');
00042 
00043 class NatTest extends UnitTestCase {
00044 
00045   function NatTest() {
00046     $this->UnitTestCase();
00047   }
00048 
00049   //
00050   // Basic Testing of Nat, rdr and binat statements
00051   //
00052   function test_basic_statements() {
00053     $pfw = new pfw();
00054     $pfw->parseRulebase('nat on $external_if from $internal to any -> $int_if');
00055     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)), 'nat on $external_if from $internal to any -> $int_if');
00056 
00057     $pfw = new pfw();
00058     $pfw->parseRulebase('rdr on $external_if from $internal to any -> $int_if');
00059     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)), 'rdr on $external_if from $internal to any -> $int_if');
00060 
00061     $pfw = new pfw();
00062     $pfw->parseRulebase('binat on $external_if from $internal to any -> $int_if');
00063     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)), 'binat on $external_if from $internal to any -> $int_if');
00064   }
00065 
00066   //
00067   // Test Nonat
00068   //
00069   function test_nonat_statements() {
00070     $pfw = new pfw();
00071     $pfw->parseRulebase('no nat on $external_if from $internal to any -> $int_if');
00072     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)), 'no nat on $external_if from $internal to any -> $int_if');    
00073   }
00074 
00075   //
00076   // Multiple interfaces
00077   //
00078   function test_nat_from_multiple_interfaces() {
00079     $pfw = new pfw();
00080     $pfw->parseRulebase('nat on {$ext_if $int_if} from $internal to any -> $int_if');
00081     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)), 'nat on { $ext_if $int_if } from $internal to any -> $int_if');    
00082   }
00083 
00084   function test_dynamic_interfaces() {
00085     $pfw = new pfw();
00086     $pfw->parseRulebase('nat on $external_if from any to any -> ($int_if)');
00087     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)), 'nat on $external_if from any to any -> ($int_if)');    
00088   }
00089 
00090   //
00091   // rdr pass
00092   //
00093   function test_rdr_pass() {
00094     $pfw = new pfw();
00095     $pfw->parseRulebase('rdr pass on $external_if from $internal to any -> $int_if');
00096     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)), 'rdr pass on $external_if from $internal to any -> $int_if');    
00097   }
00098 
00099   //
00100   // Multiple protocols
00101   //
00102   function test_multiple_protocols() {
00103     $pfw = new pfw();
00104     $pfw->parseRulebase('nat on em0 proto {tcp udp icmp} from 10.10.20.0/24 to any -> 1.2.3.4');
00105     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)), 'nat on em0 proto { tcp udp icmp } from 10.10.20.0/24 to any -> 1.2.3.4');    
00106   }
00107 
00108   //
00109   // Anchors
00110   //
00111   function test_anchors() {
00112     $pfw = new pfw();
00113     $pfw->parseRulebase('nat-anchor "authpf/*"');
00114     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)), 'nat-anchor "authpf/*"');    
00115 
00116     $pfw = new pfw();
00117     $pfw->parseRulebase('rdr-anchor "authpf/*"');
00118     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)), 'rdr-anchor "authpf/*"');    
00119 
00120     $pfw = new pfw();
00121     $pfw->parseRulebase('rdr-anchor "authpf/*"');
00122     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)), 'rdr-anchor "authpf/*"');    
00123   }
00124 
00125 }

00127 $test = &new NatTest();
00128 $test->run(new TextReporter());
